title: What is Shariah Law, And What Does it Mean for Afghan Women?
content:
1. What is Shariah Law, And What Does it Mean for Afghan Women?  The New York Times
  2. Taliban says Afghanistan will be guided by Sharia law, ‘no democratic system at all’  Fox News
  3. Taliban Offers Amnesty for Interpreters: 'We Don't Want to Take Revenge'  Bloomberg Quicktake: Now
  4. Female combat veteran: I feel helpless, and I fear for little Afghan girls I once saved  USA TODAY
  5. Opinion | The U.S. squandered the world's sympathy by invading Afghanistan and Iraq. What will it learn from defeat?  The Washington Post
